Text.Name: Temperature1
Text.Desc: It feels like so cold that one could freeze to death.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so cold it's difficult to think straight

Text.Name: Temperature2
Text.Desc: It's so cold that it's difficult to bear it.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so cold that the only way to stay remotely warm is to shiver as much as possible

Text.Name: Temperature3
Text.Desc: It's so cold that it's impossible to not shivering.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so cold that just to ward off frostbite one has to rub their hands together constantly

Text.Name: Temperature4
Text.Desc: It's a bit chilly out.
Text.StoryDesc: Whispering can be heard about whether some extra layers might be needed to stop from shivering from the cold

Text.Name: Temperature5
Text.Desc: The air felt just right, the temperature and breeze were perfect.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling that the weather couldn't be better

Text.Name: Temperature6
Text.Desc: It seems a bit hot.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so hot that sweat collects on the forehead, a fan would be nice about now

Text.Name: Temperature7
Text.Desc: It wouldn't take long to get drenched with sweat in this heat.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling impossible not to be drenched with sweat at this point

Text.Name: Temperature8
Text.Desc: It's so hot it's difficult to bear.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so hot that all clothing is soaking wet with sweat

Text.Name: Temperature9
Text.Desc: It's dangerously hot, people might start collapsing at any moment in this heat.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so hot that it's difficult to stay conscious

Text.Name: Light1
Text.Desc: It's so bright it's hard to keep one's eyes open.
Text.StoryDesc: crying due to the intense rays, trying to cover one's eyes with a hand barely helps

Text.Name: Light2
Text.Desc: The light is so intense it's difficult to bear or see.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so blind that the only thing that could be done is to squint and rub one's eyes

Text.Name: Light3
Text.Desc: The light isn't so bright, it's difficult to see.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so dark that all one can do is open their eyes as much as possible. If only it were brighter..

Text.Name: Light4
Text.Desc: It's not even possible to see one's hand in front of their face.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so dark that the only way to move around is to use one's hands to feel out one's surroundings

Text.Name: Light5
Text.Desc: Twilight sets one's heart at ease.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling easy to just relax and enjoy the twilight

Text.Name: Light6
Text.Desc: It's not possible to see one's hand in front of their face, yet it feels safe.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling easy to just relax and enjoy the darkness

Text.Name: Pain1
Text.Desc: How is it so painful, it'd be better to just faint...
Text.StoryDesc: Wailing from the pain, it feels like death must surely be near

Text.Name: Pain2
Text.Desc: It's difficult to bear, it hurts so much...
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so painful that all that can be done is to suffer through it moaning and gnashing one's teeth

Text.Name: Pain3
Text.Desc: It really hurts! When is the pain going to subside?!
Text.StoryDesc: feeling all can do to not pass out

Text.Name: Pain4
Text.Desc: It's rather painful, gnashing one's teeth seems to help.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling so blind that all can do is to grimace with pain

Text.Name: Pain5
Text.Desc: It's kind of painful...
Text.StoryDesc: With a furrowed brow, breathing deeply seems to help

Text.Name: Consciousness1
Text.Desc: Who am I and what is this place?...What happened?
Text.StoryDesc: in a mess..

Text.Name: Consciousness2
Text.Desc: My mind feels like soup...this is not a comfortable feeling.
Text.StoryDesc: sighing from the sheer dizziness

Text.Name: Consciousness3
Text.Desc: It feels like my head is full, I can't think a thing.
Text.StoryDesc: is not feeling good

Text.Name: Consciousness4
Text.Desc: I don't feel like doing a thing, I've no energy...
Text.StoryDesc: yawning from the sheer lack of energy

Text.Name: GetWet
Text.Desc: If only I had an umbrella.
Text.StoryDesc: pulling at a wet clothing...if only had a change of clothes and a nice, warm fire

Text.Name: DevilBlood
Text.Desc: There are countless demons crying in my heart...it seems like they are hungry.
Text.StoryDesc: trying to bear the demons' cries in your heart

Text.Name: DevilBlood_Satisfy
Text.Desc: Pleasure, this is what pleasure feels like.
Text.StoryDesc: letting out a long sigh due to the evil desire fulfilled in your heart

Text.Name: DevilBlood_LianHun
Text.Desc: If feels like my soul has been torn...I never knew that such pain existed.
Text.StoryDesc: gnashing your teeth due to the pain

Text.Name: AfterAbsorbGong_6
Text.Desc: It feels like cultivation isn't proving fulfilling, as if one were empty inside.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling weak, it's puzzling
